module.name: FindDlgUnit
module.short: Contains a form template for the find dialog in LCL.

descr.p: Only the .lfm file is used by the LCL (dialogs.pp). This unit is itself is not compiled into the LCL. This form is used to design the .lfm file.
The source code is a copy of ../lcl/include/finddialog.inc.
This file is part of the Lazarus Component Library (LCL).

element.name: TFindDialogForm
element.short: TForm descendant which implements a find text dialog.

element.name: TFindDialogForm.BtnPanel
element.short: Panel with the buttons displayed on the dialog form.

element.name: TFindDialogForm.EntireScopeCheckBox
element.short: Check box used for the "Search Entire File" option.

element.name: TFindDialogForm.FindButton
element.short: Button used to perform the "Find More" action.

element.name: TFindDialogForm.CancelButton
element.short: Button used to cancel and close the the dialog form.

element.name: TFindDialogForm.FlagsPanel
element.short: Panel which contains the check box options on the dialog form.

element.name: TFindDialogForm.HelpButton
element.short: Button used to display help information for the dialog form.

element.name: TFindDialogForm.WholeWordsOnlyCheckBox
element.short: Check box to enable or disable searching for whole words only.

element.name: TFindDialogForm.CaseSensitiveCheckBox
element.short: Check box to enable or disable case-sensitive search in the dialog.

element.name: TFindDialogForm.EditFind
element.short: Edit control with the value to locate using the dialog.

element.name: TFindDialogForm.DirectionRadioGroup
element.short: Radio button group used to select the search direction for the dialog.

element.name: TFindDialogForm.EditFindChange
element.short: Implements the OnChange event handler for the EditFind control.

descr.p: Enables or disables the FindButton on the dialog. The button is enabled when the text in the control is not empty.

element.name: TFindDialogForm.EditFindChange.Sender
element.short: Object instance (TControl) for the event notification, or Nil.

element.name: TFindDialogForm.FormCreate
element.short: Implements the OnCreate event handler for the form instance.

descr.p: Signals the OnChange event handler for the EditFind control on entry to set the state for the "Find More" button.

element.name: TFindDialogForm.FormCreate.Sender
element.short: Object instance for the event notification, or Nil.
